casebody.data:
Flora GOLDMAN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Solomon E. SHAHMOON et al., Defendants-Appellants. No. 129, Docket 28370. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Oct., 18, 1963. Decided Oct. 18, 1963. Sidney L. Garwin, New York City, for plaintiff-appellee. Julius Zizmor, New York City, for defendants-appellants.

Before WATERMAN, HAYS and MARSHALL, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

In open court we affirm the judgment below.
